last_episode_to_air.name: Loving the Alien
last_episode_to_air.overview: As HIV/AIDS hits NYC hard, Andy accepts a commission honoring "The Last Supper." The series takes on new resonance when he dies soon after the opening.

name: The Andy Warhol Diaries
overview: After he's shot in 1968, Andy Warhol begins documenting his life and feelings. Those diaries, and this series, reveal the secrets behind his persona.
tagline: The art you know. The artist you don't.

episodes.name: Smoke Signals
episodes.overview: Art offers an opening for expression and reinvention as Andy rises from grim Pittsburgh origins to become an innovative force in the New York art world.

episodes.name: Shadows: Andy & Jed
episodes.overview: Andy embraces his role as a portrait painter for the rich and famous. But discontent — and disco-era hedonism — tears apart his life with Jed Johnson.

episodes.name: A Double Life: Andy & Jon
episodes.overview: Fantasy propels Andy into the world of modeling and TV — and a relationship with the closeted Jon Gould — leading to explorations of drag and identity.

episodes.name: Collab: Andy & Basquiat
episodes.overview: The '80s take off, and graffiti artists inspired by pop art energize New York. Andy forms a close, fruitful friendship with Jean-Michel Basquiat.

episodes.name: 15 Minutes
episodes.overview: Andy edges into the mainstream via "Saturday Night Live" and "The Love Boat" while a collaboration deals a blow to his connection with Jean-Michel.

episodes.name: Loving the Alien
episodes.overview: As HIV/AIDS hits NYC hard, Andy accepts a commission honoring "The Last Supper." The series takes on new resonance when he dies soon after the opening.
